name: The Apps Broker
overview:
If you have an App idea that you believe is a winner then see The Apps Broker.

The objective of our organisation is to attract and evaluate ideas for Apps from users and get them developed for free. We do this via a joint venture deal with investors and developers.

A joint venture is where you get your App developed at no cost, you trade equity in your idea for the development, administration, strategy, and the marketing expertise of The Apps Broker.

Most importantly, because we have a vested interest in your App it gets our ongoing attention and commitment. It is this level of commitment that is required to ensure your App is successful. We think of an App like a business, and like any business it requires a carefully planned launch strategy, and an ongoing marketing and PR strategy, in fact it needs a great deal of ongoing attention.

Your App is much more likely to succeed when we dedicate our resources towards its development, its launch, and its marketing.

If you have an idea and your not sure what to do with it then contact us.
